plot: Confectionary whizz kid Maria is unnerved when her former schoolmate Verity joins the company she works at - because there's something altogether odd about Verity, something only Maria seems to notice.

Maria is a snack designer at a food company and her star is firmly on the rise. Then a former schoolmate, Verity, reappears in her life and odd things start to happen. Is it just Maria's imagination or is Verity somehow the cause of the strange occurrences?—grantss
